name: YouTube Style Plus (Extended theater mode + more!)
description:
Wider theater mode and subtle visual improvements. Requires the new YouTube design (www.youtube.com/new). Main feature:
  • extended theater mode
Improves look of:
  • comments
  • subscribe button
  • search bar
Increased font size:
  • Video time
  • Video title + view count
  • Playlist index
GitHub: yt-style-plus
